languages.text: "Я не буду тебя убивать, но держать тебя в экипаже опасно. Тебя возьмут под стражу и выпроводят с корабля на первой же орбитальной остановке".

traits.locale_text: "Я не буду тебя убивать, но держать тебя в экипаже опасно. Тебя возьмут под стражу и выпроводят с корабля на первой же орбитальной остановке".

languages.text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."
languages.original_text: "Я не буду тебя убивать, но держать тебя в экипаже опасно. Тебя возьмут под стражу и выпроводят с корабля на первой же орбитальной остановке".

traits.locale_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."
"I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."
"I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."
"I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

languages.text: “我不想杀你，但把你留在船员之中会很危险。我会派人把你看管好。等我们下次靠港的时候，我会派人护送你离开这艘船。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

traits.locale_text: “我不想杀你，但把你留在船员之中会很危险。我会派人把你看管好。等我们下次靠港的时候，我会派人护送你离开这艘船。”

languages.text: «No voy a matarla, pero es un peligro para la tripulación. Permanecerá bajo guardia y bajará de la nave en la primera parada orbital que encontremos».
languages.original_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

traits.locale_text: «No voy a matarla, pero es un peligro para la tripulación. Permanecerá bajo guardia y bajará de la nave en la primera parada orbital que encontremos».

languages.text: 「お前を殺すつもりはないが、クルーの中に入れておくのは危険だ。次の軌道上の停泊地で、護衛をつけて船からおりてもらう」
languages.original_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を殺すつもりはないが、クルーの中に入れておくのは危険だ。次の軌道上の停泊地で、護衛をつけて船からおりてもらう」

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch nicht töten, aber Euch in der Crew zu behalten, ist gefährlich. Ihr werdet unter Arrest gestellt und im nächsten Orbitalhafen vom Schiff gebracht."
languages.original_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch nicht töten, aber Euch in der Crew zu behalten, ist gefährlich. Ihr werdet unter Arrest gestellt und im nächsten Orbitalhafen vom Schiff gebracht."

languages.text: « Je veux bien vous laisser la vie sauve, mais je ne peux pas vous garder dans l'équipage. C'est trop dangereux. Vous allez être placée sous surveillance et vous débarquerez à la première station orbitale que nous croiserons. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux bien vous laisser la vie sauve, mais je ne peux pas vous garder dans l'équipage. C'est trop dangereux. Vous allez être placée sous surveillance et vous débarquerez à la première station orbitale que nous croiserons. »

languages.text: "Canını almayacağım ama mürettebatta kalman da tehlikeli. Gözetim altına alınacak ve varacağımız en yakın yörünge durağında gemiden indirileceksin."
languages.original_text: "I'm not going to kill you, but keeping you in the crew is dangerous. You'll be put under guard and escorted from the ship at the first orbital stop we come to."

traits.locale_text: "Canını almayacağım ama mürettebatta kalman da tehlikeli. Gözetim altına alınacaksın ve vardığımız ilk yörüngede gemiden indirileceksin."
